## dapr publish

Publish an event to multiple consumers

### Synopsis

Publish an event to multiple consumers

```
dapr publish [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --data string     (optional) a json serialized string
  -h, --help            help for publish
      --pubsub string   name of the pub/sub component
  -t, --topic string    the topic the app is listening on
```
